sentences.en: Any of several spiny animals, such as the porcupine that are similar to the hedgehog.
sentences.cn: 美洲箭猪,豪猪:几种带刺动物中的一种, 如豪猪,类似刺猬.

sentences.en: Australian shrubs and small trees with evergreen usually spiny leaves and dense clusters of showy flowers.
sentences.cn: 在澳大利亚通常长有长青多刺的叶子和稠密的华丽花丛的乔木和的灌木.

sentences.en: California evergreen wild plum with spiny leathery leaves and white flowers.
sentences.cn: 加州常绿野生李属植物,多刺革质树叶,白色花冠.

sentences.en: Cortical microtubules and spiny vesicles appear in the cytoplasm after germination of the pollen tube.
sentences.cn: 花粉萌发后,细胞质中出现周质微管和被刺小泡,此期细胞器的变化不明显.

sentences.en: Deep - bodied sooty - black pelagic spiny - finned fish of North Atlantic and North Pacific, valued for food.
sentences.cn: 北大西洋和北太平洋远洋深水中熏黑色刺状鳍鱼, 珍贵食品.

sentences.en: Eurasian plant having loose racemes of pink or purple flowers and spiny stems and tough roots.
sentences.cn: 欧亚的一种植物,具有疏松的粉红色或紫色总状花序、有刺的茎和坚韧的根.

sentences.en: Old World genus of tropical evergreen usually spiny shrubs.
sentences.cn: 通常多刺的热带灌木的旧大陆的属.

sentences.en: Spiny green durian fruit for sale at a Singapore market is known for its rotting stench.
sentences.cn: 食蕊在自然界的模式.多刺的,绿榴莲果实,销售在新加坡市场,是众所周知的,其腐烂的恶臭味.

sentences.en: Stay away from a spiny cactus.
The wormlike, often brightly colored, hairy or spiny larva of a butterfly or moth.
sentences.cn: 蝴蝶或蛾子的幼虫,形似蠕虫, 通常体色鲜艳, 有毛或有刺.

words.tran_cn: 脊髓的；脊柱的；针的；脊骨的；尖刺的
刺状的；多刺的；尖尖的；难弄的
多刺的；麻烦的；尖刺状的

trans.tran_cn: 长满刺的，多刺的，带刺的
trans.tran_en: a spiny animal or plant has lots of stiff sharp points
